alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Warren (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 28 at 2:27PM EST until further notice by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Virginia... West Virginia... Shenandoah River at Millville affecting Clarke, Warren and Jefferson Counties. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Shenandoah River at Millville. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Parts of Bloomery Road and John Rissler Road are flooded near Bloomery, West Virginia. Once these roads flood, access to homes is impaired but the homes themselves are not in any danger of flooding. Moulton Park and the Millville boat launch are also flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM EST Sunday the stage was 3.7 feet, or 6.3 feet below flood stage. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached based on the latest forecast information. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information && River Name Fld Observed Sun Mon Mon Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time 7PM 1AM 7AM Stg Time Date Shenandoah River Millville 10.0 3.7 Sun 1 pm 5.5 6.9 7.7 9.5 1pm Mon &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/washington or www.weather.gov/baltimore. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1030 PM EST.
